Death Of A 
      Dream 
Saturday, May 12, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT

Catherine Woods, an aspiring 
      dancer, was drawn to New York City and 
      Broadway with dreams of making it big. Instead, she made headlines when 
      she was found brutally murdered in her apartment. 
 
Catherine also had a secret, 
      which she was keeping from her family. And she had two boyfriends, who 
      initially didn't know about each other. Did these secrets contribute to 
      her death?
 
Correspondent Erin 
      Moriarty 
      reports for 48 Hours 
      Mystery, this Saturday, May 12, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT.
 
Click 
      here to 
      watch Moriarty's reporter's 
      notebook.
